## Block.setNextStatement() method

Set whether another block can chain onto the bottom of this block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setNextStatement(newBoolean: boolean, opt_check?: string | string[] | null): void;
```

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

newBoolean


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

True if there can be a next statement.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

opt\_check


</td><td>

string \| string\[\] \| null


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Statement type or list of statement types. Null/undefined if any type could be connected.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

void
